patthana16.61:1.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanaappaṭigho naāsavo
patthana16.61:1.1_1: ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca
patthana16.61:1.1_2: dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati
patthana16.61:1.1_3: hetupaccayā …pe… anidassanaappaṭighaṁ āsavañceva sāsavañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.61:1.1_4: naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca naanidassanasappaṭigho naāsavo ceva naanāsavo ca dhammā
patthana16.61:1.1_5: uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe tīṇi …pe… avigate cha.
patthana16.61:2.1_0: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.61:2.1_1: naanāsavo ceva nanoāsavo ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva
patthana16.61:2.1_2: no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo
patthana16.61:2.1_3: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Anidassanasappaṭighaṁ sāsavañceva no ca āsavaṁ dhammaṁ
patthana16.61:2.1_4: paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naanāsavo ceva nano ca āsavo naanidassanasappaṭigho
patthana16.61:2.1_5: naanāsavo ceva nano āsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā
